org.mmbase.applications.packaging.providerhandlers
Class HttpProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.mmbase.applications.packaging.providerhandlers.BasicProvider
      org.mmbase.applications.packaging.providerhandlers.HttpProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProviderInterface
public class HttpProvider
extends BasicProvider
implements ProviderInterface

HttpProvider, Handler for Http Providers. gets packages and bundles from the provider and feeds them to the package and bundle managers.

Author:
Daniel Ockeloen (MMBased)
